column1: Little Goat Diner////It's a Stephanie Izard restaurant
column2: so can't be bad. Service was a bit slow and kind of like "you're going to deal with it because we are a popular place." I dig that they serve breakfast all day
column3: although I am more of a lunch person myself. Everything is ala cart so if you order one of their amazing sandwiches
column4: be prepared to order a side of fries for eight dollars. I have to say though for what it is worth
column5: they have the best fountain Diet Coke I have ever had!
